parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Optional domain option for granular overrides.

functions.name: set
functions.description: Modifies overrides to enable or disable target.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Determines whether we enable or disable it.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Optional domain option for granular overrides.

functions.name: setAll
functions.description: Modifies overrides to enable or disable all of the targets.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Determines whether we enable or disable.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Optional domain option for granular overrides.

functions.name: removeGranularTarget
functions.description: Removes a granular target from the given domain. Unlike set, this function will not add -Target to overrides.

functions.name: clearGranularTargets
functions.description: Clears all the overrides from the given domain.

functions.name: resetToDefaults
functions.description: Modifies overrides to only enable defaults.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Optional domain option for granular overrides.

functions.name: invalidTargets
functions.description: Validates the overrides and returns unknown targets.

functions.name: targets
functions.description: Returns a list of available targets. Won't validate targets.

functions.name: defaults
functions.description: Returns a list of default targets
